segments.text: I'm looking at a kitchen, an ordinary one it seems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The details are drawn with simple lines, but the scene is quite vivid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Right away, my eyes are drawn to the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh my, the water is just gushing out of the faucet!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's completely overflowing, spilling over the edge in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is already quite wide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman stands right there, her foot actually in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing a plate, completely engrossed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not notice the flood around her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is already flowing down the cabinet doors beneath the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope someone points it out to her soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole floor is going to be ruined at this rate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing how oblivious she appears to be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could cause a lot of damage, maybe even a slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a strange situation, a calm scene with such obvious peril.
segments.speaker: PAR
